## Co-op Applications Suck A Lot of The Time

Over the past few days with the next round of co-op applications reaching their deadline, my life has just been resume into cover letter into resume into cover letter into...

Yeah, you get the point.

It's really nerve racking knowing that despite all of my applications, I'm not even guaranteed an interview! At this point, I'm not even gunning for any position in specific, but just something! Anything! Please!
